error-message.email-match: Les adresses courriel entrées ne concordent pas
error-message.email-valid: Entrez l'adresse courriel dans le bon format, par exemple nom@exemple.com
error-message.preferred-language-required: Sélectionnez la langue de communication préférée

success.subscribe-successful: (FR) You have successfully subscribed to Canada Dental Care Plan. You will receive emails at {{userEmailAddress}} when important new Canada Dental Care Plan information is available in your My Service Canada Account.
success.change-email: (FR) If you wish to update your email address, navigate to <personalInformationLink>Manage my Personal Information</personalInformationLink>.

manage.unsubscribe-note: (FR) Select <unsubscribelink>Unsubscribe from CDCP email alerts</unsubscribelink> to complete the process to no longer receive emails when important new CDCP claim information is available.

error-message.email-match: Les adresses courriel entrées ne concordent pas
error-message.email-valid: Entrez l'adresse courriel dans le bon format, par exemple nom@exemple.com
error-message.preferred-language-required: Sélectionnez la langue de communication préférée

unsubscribe.note: (FR) If you unsubscribe from CDCP email alerts, you will no longer receive emails when important new CDCP information is available. Email address to be cancelled is:

error-message.agree-required: (FR) Check "I Agree" piror to select Unsubscribe from CDCP email alerts.

breadcrumbs.subscribe: (FR) Confirm to subscribe to CDCP email alerts

confirm.confirmation-information-text: (FR) A confirmation code, required to finish the registration process, will be sent to {{userEmailAddress}}. This step must be completed within the next 48 hours or by immediately entering the confirmation code below.
confirm.confirmation-completed-text: (FR) Upon completion, you will begin to receive email alerts when important information for your Canada Dental Care Plan application is available.
confirm.code-sent-by-email: (FR) You have requested a new confirmation code and will receive an email at {{userEmailAddress}} to finish the registration process. This final step which must be completed within the next 48 hours, will allow you to reveive emails when important new Canadian Dental Care plan information is available in your My Service Canada Account.

breadcrumbs.subscribe: (FR) Confirm to subscribe to CDCP email alerts

expired.confirm-code-expired: (FR) The confirmation code sent to you has expired. Select the "Request New Confirmation Code" button below to have a new confirmation code sent to you at {{userEmailAddress}}.

success.unsubscribe-successful: (FR) You have successfully unsubscribed from Canada Dental Care Plan. You will no longer receive emails when important new Canada Dental Care Plan information is available in your My Service Canada Account.
success.subscribe-again: (FR) You may subscribe again to Canada Dental Care Plan alerts by <subscribelink>completing the subscription process</subscribelink>.
